org.apache.derbyTesting.functionTests.tests.store

Class IndexSplitDeadlockTest.AsyncThread

extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Class that executes an AsyncTask object.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AsyncThread

        public AsyncThread(IndexSplitDeadlockTest.AsyncTask task)
        Create an AsyncThread object and starts a thread executing the task. Also put the AsyncThread object in the list of threads in the parent object to make sure the thread is waited for and its errors detected in the tearDown() method.
        Parameters:
        task - the task to perform

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Open a database connection and perform the task. Roll back the transaction when finished. Any exception thrown will be caught and rethrown when the waitFor() method is called.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • waitFor

        void waitFor()
      throws java.lang.Exception
        Wait for the thread to complete. If an error was thrown during execution, rethrow the execption here.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if an error happened while performing the task
